hero.title: Real‑world engineering of intelligent systems—across digital and biological complexity
hero.subtitle: AIMeD builds next‑generation platforms and systems that help organizations design, simulate, operate, and scale complex ecosystems across industries—powered by AMIS.
hero.micro: From lab‑to‑production systems and regulated enterprise workflows, AIMeD delivers trusted, scalable intelligence foundations for what comes next.

highlights: **Multidomain reuse** (one core platform, many vertical layers)

solutions.title: Life Sciences & Bio-Engineering
usecases: Molecular and systems-level modeling (domain-specific, simulation-driven workflows)
Bio-digital platform engineering for research-to-translation pipelines
Scientific data harmonization and knowledge discovery
Decision frameworks for complex experimental pipelines
outcomes: Reduced fragmentation between tools, teams, and data

solutions.title: Banking & Financial Services (BFSI)
usecases: Risk modeling and decision orchestration platforms
Policy-driven access control and audit-ready systems
Process automation and integration across legacy + modern stacks

solutions.title: Education & Knowledge Systems
usecases: Knowledge systems: curriculum intelligence, content orchestration

solutions.title: Enterprise IT & Cloud Platforms
usecases: Cloud and hybrid workloads, environment segregation
Governance-driven data and access control platforms

solutions.title: Public Sector & Regulated Environments
usecases: Secure data exchange and governance platforms

amis.spotlightSubtitle: One platform core. Many domain applications.

modules.title: AMIS Core
bullets: Platform runtime foundations (tenancy, config, deployment patterns)

modules.title: AMIS Data Fabric
bullets: Secure data access patterns and lineage

modules.title: AMIS Integration Hub
bullets: API gateway patterns, event bus patterns
Connectors for enterprise and partner ecosystems

problems.title: Eliminating fragmentation
problems.text: Silos across tools, teams, data, and environments slow execution. AIMeD unifies architectures and workflows using AMIS as the core platform layer.

problems.title: Making advanced systems accessible
problems.text: Complex platforms often require high expertise and high cost. AIMeD delivers repeatable patterns with scalable deployment options.

problems.title: Streamlining end-to-end workflows
problems.text: Disconnected workflows reduce speed and traceability. AIMeD enables automation, orchestration, and audit-ready operations.

problems.title: Building for evolution
problems.text: Teams get locked into today’s tools. AIMeD’s technology-agnostic foundation keeps your platform adaptable. ---

markets.title: Startups (Deep-tech / Bio / SaaS)
markets.text: Accelerate product engineering and platform readiness with AMIS patterns.

markets.title: Mid-market enterprises
markets.text: Modernize platforms with governance-first intelligence layers.

markets.title: Large enterprises (BFSI / regulated)
markets.text: Deploy audit-ready systems with secure integrations and observability.
